attributes.review: This app took forever to download. It is glitchy. And when I click things nothing happens. Worst app. If I could give 0 stars I would🤢🤮😷😷😷

attributes.review: i got this app to support my black supportive, lgbtq+ ally, mexican lover, non orange president. it was sooo disappointing. immediately after i got it my phone lost all data and all accounts i owned were deleted. then a random fat orange guy appeared on my phone and told me to go back to where i was from. >:( i’m so disappointed with this app -10/10 worst ever
attributes.title: disappointing

attributes.review: Hate speech. Bad content in general. Took forever to download. DO NOT ENABLE LOCATION SERVICES they will send a representative telling you to go back to your country. Awful experience and I even got spit on.
